import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET
import os

def extract_document_text\(docx_path, extract_dir\):
    """Extract all text from a DOCX file"""
    os.system\(f'cd /tmp && unzip -q "{docx_path}" -d {extract_dir} 2>&1'\)
    
    tree = ET.parse\(f'/tmp/{extract_dir}/word/document.xml'\)
    root = tree.getroot\(\)
    
    # Define namespace
    ns = {'w': 'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main'}
    
    # Extract all text elements
    text_elements = []
    for elem in root.findall\('.//w:t', ns\):
        if elem.text:
            text_elements.append\(elem.text\)
    
    return ' '.join\(text_elements\)

# Document 1
doc1_text = extract_document_text\(
    "/e/erp/documents/Erp Screen Mapping â€“ Sop To System Functional Mapping.docx",
    "docx1"
\)

print\("=" * 80\)
print\("DOCUMENT 1: ERP Screen Mapping - SOP to System Functional Mapping"\)
print\("=" * 80\)
print\(doc1_text\)
print\("\\n"\)

PYTHON_EOF)
